1. Item drop chances display when the player opens crystal boxes.
2. Chatting policy agreement added.
3. Item decomposing charge time changes 10 minutes from 15.
4. Added a toggle button which can hide each appearance of a cape and utility equipm

1. Fixed the bug when setting up the Chain skills in Skillset.
2. Fixed the bug that could not enter The Mine of the Death when attempting to resume mine progress.
3. Purified Alnilam Accessories can be crafted on Miner Guild.
4. Infinite loading

1. The Mine of the Death

2. Crafting Item Changes

3. Cash Shop added.

1. Mine of the Death
- Ranking/weekly ranking per class added.
2. Skill balance changes
- Fighter: Beast Strike: DOT damage doubled.
- Fighter: Wolf Rush: Critical hit chance+ added from 11lv.
- Fighter: Concentrated Slash: 8-way targeting.
